sn34.13:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na samadhismim kallitakusalo.
sn34.13:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim kallitakusalo hoti, na samadhismim samapattikusalo.
sn34.13:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim kallitakusalo.
sn34.13:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim kallitakusalo ca.
